Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/Clark
ShortDescription: 72 North buses will terminate at North Avenue/Clark due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North Avenue buses will terminate at North Avenue/Clark due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

Allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: #63 63rd buses will terminate at Stony Island due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

How does this affect my trip?

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Addison, Racine, Diversey & Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Addison, Racine, Diversey, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity at North/Clybourn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity at North/Clybourn.

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Red Line service to Howard

For service toward Howard, after stopping at Cermak-Chinatown, trains will then be diverted to the above-listed elevated stations, in the opposite order, through Armitage and then make all normal stops from Fullerton to Howard.

For service in areas away from where the Red Line is running

Consider using local bus alternatives through the area where you're traveling, including those to other train lines or where Red Line service has been rerouted to operate.
